tokenCount/hint:
The number of tokens in the message. Counted using the currently selected model's tokeniser.

Requires the model to be loaded.
messageTokenCount/hint:
The number of tokens in the message. Counted using the currently selected model's tokeniser.

Does **NOT** include an estimate of tokens in file attachments.
speculativeDecodingVisualization/cannotC: View mode selection is disabled when visualising draft tokens.
